attributes.background:
Roy Hudd OBE has been entertaining spreading joy and laughter for 63 Years and works tirelessly for many charities including The British Music Hall Society & Grand Order of Water Rats.
He holds the World record for the Longest Running Scripted Radio Programme for 26 Years of The News Huddlines.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given an honour.

You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
